title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: The default line delimiters for new files are not defined in the UI.
EB: The UI should have a feature to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Use a Windows workstation as an X terminal.
2. Run Eclipse on the workstation.
3. Try to find the option to define the default line delimiters for new files in the preferences UI and observe that it is missing.
